Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.math

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stuypulse.stuylib.math.Mesh
  • public final class Mesh
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent a group of Vector2D points.

    • Constructor Summary
